server.controller

Interface RMIServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientConnectionRMI, ClientConnectionSocket, RMIControllerServer

    public interface RMIServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    RMIClient uses this interface to call RMI_Server methods
